law.catch_line: In this section the following terms have the meanings indicated....

section.section: In this section the following terms have the meanings indicated.

"Community association" means:
A condominium council of unit owners organized under Title 11, Subtitle 1 of this article;
A homeowners association organized under Title 11B of this article; or
A cooperative housing corporation organized under Title 5, Subtitle 6B of the Corporations and Associations Article.
"Office" means the Prince George's County Office of Community Relations.
"Registry" means the Community Association Managers Registry.

text.section: This section applies only in Prince George's County.
On or after January 1, 2011, the Office shall establish a Registry.

Any entity, including a sole proprietorship, that provides community association management services for community associations located in the county shall register with the Registry and renew its registration by January 31 of each year.

section.section:
The Office shall:
Provide the registration form; and
Collect a fee from each entity that registers under this section.
The annual fee charged shall be set at $100.

text.section: The Office may make any information received under this section available to the public, subject to the provisions of the Maryland Public Information Act.

A person who commits a willful violation of this section or who causes a person to commit a willful violation of this section is guilty of a misdemeanor and on conviction is subject to a fine not exceeding $1,000.
